While it has a distinct flavor profile, it is not as zesty as some other carbonated beverages that might be described as having a more intense or bold taste. Diet Coke has a sweet, slightly artificial taste that is recognizable but not overly strong or complex. Therefore, it leans towards the zesty side of the spectrum but is not as zesty as some other drinks. Based on my personal experience, Diet Coke is a familiar and easily recognizable beverage, but it doesn't have the punchy, bold flavor that would place it entirely on the zesty end.
